statements: SELECT * FROM AlternativeFuelTransportation WHERE fuel_type = 'Electric';
SELECT vehicle_id, location FROM AlternativeFuelTransportation WHERE fuel_usage > 50;
SELECT vehicle_type, fuel_type FROM AlternativeFuelTransportation WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT * FROM AlternativeFuelTransportation ORDER BY vehicle_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM AlternativeFuelTransportation;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, fuel_type, fuel_usage, location FROM AlternativeFuelTransportation WHERE vehicle_type = 'Electric';
SELECT location, vehicle_type, fuel_type, vehicle_id, fuel_usage FROM AlternativeFuelTransportation WHERE fuel_type = 'Hybrid' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM AlternativeFuelTransportation WHERE fuel_type = 'Electric' OR fuel_type = 'Hydrogen' ORDER BY fuel_type DESC, vehicle_id ASC;
SELECT vehicle_type, fuel_type, location FROM AlternativeFuelTransportation WHERE fuel_usage > 50.00 AND location LIKE '%California%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT AVG(fuel_usage) AS average_fuel_usage, fuel_type FROM AlternativeFuelTransportation GROUP BY fuel_type HAVING AVG(fuel_usage) > 30.00 ORDER BY average_fuel_usage DESC;
SELECT * FROM alternative_fuel_usage;
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_type FROM alternative_fuel_usage WHERE fuel_level > 50;
SELECT fuel_type, fuel_level, date FROM alternative_fuel_usage ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT adoption_id, adoption_status FROM transportation_adoption WHERE adoption_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_type, fuel_level FROM alternative_fuel_usage WHERE fuel_type = 'Electric' ORDER BY fuel_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM alternative_fuel_usage WHERE fuel_level > 50
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_type FROM alternative_fuel_usage WHERE date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT adoption_id, adoption_status FROM transportation_adoption JOIN alternative_fuel_usage ON transportation_adoption.vehicle_id = alternative_fuel_usage.vehicle_id WHERE adoption_status = TRUE
SELECT * FROM transportation_adoption WHERE adoption_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT MAX(fuel_level) AS max_fuel_level, MIN(fuel_level) AS min_fuel_level FROM alternative_fuel_usage
SELECT * FROM alternative_fuel_usage WHERE fuel_amount > 50
SELECT vehicle_type, fuel_type FROM alternative_fuel_usage ORDER BY fuel_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM transportation_vehicles WHERE vehicle_year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020
SELECT vehicle_model, fuel_capacity FROM transportation_vehicles ORDER BY vehicle_year ASC
SELECT source_name, source_description FROM sustainable_energy_sources
SELECT * FROM alternative_fuel_usage WHERE fuel_type = 'Electric'
SELECT vehicle_type, fuel_type, fuel_amount FROM alternative_fuel_usage ORDER BY fuel_amount DESC
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, fuel_type, fuel_amount FROM alternative_fuel_usage WHERE fuel_amount > 50 ORDER BY vehicle_type ASC
SELECT * FROM transportation_vehicles WHERE vehicle_year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020
SELECT source_name, source_description FROM sustainable_energy_sources
SELECT * FROM alternative_fuel_vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model FROM alternative_fuel_vehicles WHERE fuel_type = 'Electric';
SELECT station_name, hourly_sales FROM fueling_stations ORDER BY hourly_sales DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, station_id, fuel_amount, time_stamp FROM fuel_usage_logs WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT maintenance_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_cost FROM vehicle_maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM alternative_fuel_vehicles WHERE fuel_type = 'Electric';
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model FROM alternative_fuel_vehicles WHERE vehicle_make = 'Tesla' ORDER BY vehicle_model;
SELECT station_name, location, hourly_sales FROM fueling_stations WHERE hourly_sales > 1000 ORDER BY hourly_sales DESC;

SELECT vf.vehicle_make, vf.vehicle_model, fu.fuel_amount, fu.time_stamp FROM alternative_fuel_vehicles vf JOIN fuel_usage_logs fu ON vf.vehicle_id = fu.vehicle_id WHERE fu.fuel_amount > 50 ORDER BY fu.time_stamp DESC;

SELECT vm.vehicle_id, vm.maintenance_type, vm.maintenance_cost, vl.maintenance_date FROM vehicle_maintenance_logs vm JOIN vehicle_maintenance_logs vl ON vm.vehicle_id = vl.vehicle_id WHERE vm.maintenance_cost > 500 AND vl.maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT * FROM fuel_types;
SELECT vehicle_name, fuel_type FROM vehicles JOIN fuel_types ON vehicles.fuel_id = fuel_types.id;
SELECT manufacturer_name FROM manufacturers WHERE id = 1;

SELECT vehicle_name, manufacturer_name FROM vehicles JOIN vehicle_manufacturer ON vehicles.id = vehicle_manufacturer.vehicle_id JOIN manufacturers ON vehicle_manufacturer.manufacturer_id = manufacturers.id;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_usage WHERE miles_driven > 1000 ORDER BY usage_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM fuel_types;
SELECT vehicle_name, fuel_type FROM vehicles INNER JOIN fuel_types ON vehicles.fuel_id = fuel_types.id;
SELECT manufacturer_name FROM manufacturers WHERE id IN (SELECT manufacturer_id FROM vehicle_manufacturer);

SELECT vehicle_name, manufacturer_name FROM vehicles JOIN vehicle_manufacturer ON vehicles.id = vehicle_manufacturer.vehicle_id JOIN manufacturers ON vehicle_manufacturer.manufacturer_id = manufacturers.id;
SELECT vehicle_name, usage_date, miles_driven FROM vehicles JOIN vehicle_usage ON vehicles.id = vehicle_usage.vehicle_id WHERE miles_driven > 1000 ORDER BY usage_date DESC;
